rules_text:
Trample
Provoke [i](Whenever this creature attacks, you may have target creature defending player controls untap and block it if able.)[/i]
Whenever Tenshi deals combat damage to a creature, exile that many cards from the top of your library. Until your next turn, you may play those cards.
notes:
!tag SWR
!tag Tenshi
!tag Fighter
!tag Spinoff
!tag Heaven
